snippet: Rory McIlroy hit a wedge within 5 feet of the pin for a birdie on the 18th hole on Friday to retain the lead halfway through the Dubai Desert Classic.
abstract: Rory McIlroy takes second-round lead at Dubai Desert Classic; other golf news noted.
lead_paragraph: Rory McIlroy hit a wedge within 5 feet of the pin for a birdie on the 18th hole on Friday to retain the lead halfway through the Dubai Desert Classic.
